name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: header_cta_link
label: Header CTA link
description: The link for the call to action in the header above the search box. Use /relative-links/ or absolute like http://tendenci.com

name: header_cta_title
label: Header CTA text
description: The text for the call to action link in the header above the search box.

name: top_right_space
label: Top Right Space
description: This space is the last box on right. This setting controls the space on the homepage in the sidebar below the featured sponsor. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('single_event.html','Single Event'),('stories_headlines.html','Custom Headline list'),('boxes_group.html','Boxes Group'),('news_list.html','News list'),('news_articles_featured.html','Latest News and Article'), ('romney_event.html', 'Romney Event')] #<box_list>
